div.span: Re: Two Additional Employees Test Positive

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
p.span: word, late last night and this morning,
. This makes a total of four employees with positive tests.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
p.span: Both of the employees most recently testing positive were
in the food delivery on Monday, March 30,
2020. One served as a driver on the route which included stops at Pleasant View Baptist
Church, Elliston Baptist Church, and Mt. Zion Park.

The second employee helped distribute food from Special Needs Bus # 154, along the following roads: Warsaw Avenue, Warsaw Road, Clarks Creek Road, Bridle Court, Ambassador Drive, Folsom-Jonesville Road, Clark Street, Arbor Lane, Michigan Ave., Redwood, and Ellen-Kay Drive. As it is believed that any exposure to our families would hav
e been outside the contagious period, w
transparency, and to provide for every precaution.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
p.span: Please be aware that due to HIPAA laws, we may not continue to communicate every known positive case of COVID-19 that occurs among our staff – particularly if there has been no known exposure to the public or to co-workers. However, please be assured that if/when t

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
p.span: For any real or possible cases of COVID-19 that may occur, but
come with the health department’s recommendation to communicate, we
simply urge you to remain diligent in following
all the precautionary measures that have been publicized throughout the last several
you have questions regarding your / your child’s health and/or COVID-19, please reference the
, our district is happy to help with any questions if we can.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
p.span: We ask that you please keep these employees and their families in your thoughts and prayers.
May each of you and your family remain safe and healthy.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-left: 0in; direction: ltr; unicode-bidi: embed
